content: Name a foreign language film that won the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival and has a runtime over 150 minutes.

One foreign language film that won the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival and has a runtime over 150 minutes is "Parasite" by Bong Joon-ho. However, its runtime is just under 150 minutes. Another notable film that fits the criteria is "Uncle Boonmee Who Can Recall His Past Lives" (2010) by Apichatpong Weerasethakul, which has a runtime of 173 minutes.
